game for nominate badge please thank  you

Como explicar essa falha que os desenvolvedores continuam tirando o leite? Eu explicarei o mais rápido e básico o possível, Vamos para os pontos negativos primeiro:
-O jogo tem hitbox satânica, não espere fugir do ataque de lunge do killer
-O jogo tem servers dedicados mas são podres(se tu tiver de qualquer killer, e o cara tiver mais lagado que o satanás em dia cristão e tu for pegar ele, teu jogo buga, olha ai onde tu foi jogar dinheiro
-Os desenvolvedores são porcos, não tão nem ai pra comunidade, a ideologia deles é:''lança dlc que eles vão comprar e vão amar o killer originalmente ''op'' e depois nerfamos ele pra virar um clown 2.0
-A comunidade mais tóxica da terra, aqui tu encontra até um mutante de chernobyl de tão tóxico os cara é
-Tem como explicar isso? O jogo te bane se tu quitar da partida porque tu tá com ping 9999, como se fosse meu problema eles não ajeitarem a po#r$a do servidor cagado deles
-Eu já te falei das dlcs caras? ter que jogar e jogar fazendo grind pra pegar um personagem original?
-Bugs, bugs e mais bugs, será que a ubisoft tocou nesse jogo?

Pontos positivos:
-Divertidos com amigos e sem a lag, apesar disso não recomendo esse jogo pra ninguém, só se tu for um doido que nem eu, ai meu brother, espero te ver no dbd como survivor pra nós jogar junto <3

Ponto final:Não jogue, a menos que tu tenha 100-200 reais extra pra tu comprar as dlcs e paciência e muita força de vontade pra não morrer de câncer no coração com um jogo que os desenvolvedor cagou no próprio jogo deles
good game would recommend , if u hate face campers dont play this game .....on second thought this game is trash and the sweaty players ruined it for me , would not recommend 10/10

It's just good, daft fun. You're either swearing because you just missed skill check or swearing because someone just wriggled out of your grip, but either way you're swearing. Rounds aren't too long and no one's sore if they lose. Just go again!

I played this game on my friend computer when first DLC was out and to be honest it was the best game i ever played and it was scary with the killer being op but now its the survivors are op. its really annoying now, i love playing the killer but i have to camp people now when they are on a hook cause once they get off they heal and i never see them again(of course they message and say im being unfair yet they all have toolboxes or perks that make fixing a generator like a walk in the park even its the main goal and supposed to be hard) and when i played survivors it was scary knowing im screwed if im found like a real horror game or i don't want to be caught but hey i can juke, out run,take hits when ever i wont cause survivors are broken, totally lost the horror element now, i never seen a game go so far downhill in a year like this. and if the DEVS are reading this plz unnerf killer and unbuffs survivors this is supposed to be a horror game not a game tha'ts supposed to be get me mad like dark souls if i want a challenge then i play survivors not killers,if you bought this get a refund before you cant and if you cant just hit the uninstall button trust me it will save you.

Уникальная и единственная в своём жанре игра, которая больше 4 лет активно развивается и поддерживается разработчиками. Она так и не получила достойных конкурентов (Пятница 13 быстро сдохла, а Last Year и вовсе родилась мёртвой, да и вообще о другом), поэтому ничего лучше в данном жанре человечество пока не придумало. Несмотря на все те косяки, на которые повсеместно жалуются, никакие критичные баги надолго не задерживаются (хоть и периодически завозятся новые), а правки баланса, переработки силы убийц и работы перков случаются нередко, что говорит в пользу заинтересованности разработчиков в развитии продукта.
O jogo era divertido, mas tinha problemas de balanceamento. Hoje em dia, cada partida é ta pior que a outra, com o sistema de matchmaking horrível e um balanceamento feito por neandertais.
Addictive, frustrating, exciting, grueling, intense, toxic, noob-friendly and buggy. Five stars!

Mais sinon DBD c'est énorme , l'essayer c'est l'adopter 😉

I've played this game at least with one friend for all games in both public and custom matches. And I have to say I would never want to play it with only strangers unless I was the killer and even then not really. It is much more fun to play with friends especially if you can get a full party. The custom matches where everything is unlocked is so much better than the public games as well. Over all, I enjoy the variation of killers and the build potentials; but it is really only fun with friends where you are not in serious competition.

TL;DR If you want to play Solo this probably isn't for you if you don't like the grind. If you want to play with friends this game is great!
the gameplay is amazing! its fun to play, you get to make friends from it, its the best honestly

Нахуй не берите эту игру, просто.У меня из за неё пороноя, мне кажется только меня сливают и ВСЁ БОЛЬШЕ НЕ КОГО. Тимейты толпятся у геника, а убийца только ЗА МНОЙ. Играя в эту игру я получаю только: гнев, злость, ненависть и пороною. Пример из каждой катки: тимейты ченят геник меня повесили, они меня не пойдут  хелпануть, они его дочинят подойтут ко мне и не успеют снять, вы скажите я хуёва играю, типо 16 часов только, но блять почему мне за 16 часов развилась пороноя в этой игре? Убийца только меня убивает, 1 гениратор, все тимейты там я где-то в жопе и убийца меня убивает. Нахуй эту  хуйню, если продолжу играть, то стану параноиком, токсиком, донатером и смотрящий гайды как не умирать в этой хуйне. Спасибо за сломаные нервы...И да ещё я играл за чёрного персонажа, может за этого умирал. Как в фильмах, но сука нервов теперь нету.

Devs are lucky that someone else didn't just come along and make a better game of the same genre because god knows even a child could do it.

Only redeeming factor is I can make people cry in it.
